[00:00.00]I Love Me (Explicit) - Demi Lovato (黛米·洛瓦托)
[00:02.18]Lyrics by：Keith Sorrells/Alex Niceforo/Demi Lovato/Sean Douglas/Jennifer Decilveo/Anne-Marie Nicholson/Warren Felder
[00:04.37]Composed by：Keith Sorrells/Alex Niceforo/Demi Lovato/Sean Douglas/Jennifer Decilveo/Anne-Marie Nicholson/Warren Felder
[00:06.56]Flippin' through all these magazines
[00:09.82]Tellin' me who I'm supposed to be
[00:13.07]Way too good at camouflage
[00:15.54]Can't see what I am I just see what I'm not
[00:18.70]I'm guilty 'bout everything that I eat
[00:22.67]Feelin' myself is a felony
[00:25.84]Jedi level sabotage
[00:28.34]Voices in my head make up my entourage
[00:31.68]'Cause I'm a black belt when I'm beating up on myself
[00:34.81]But I'm an expert at giving love to somebody else
[00:38.35]I me myself and
[00:39.99]I don't see eye to eye
[00:42.34]Me myself and I
[00:44.25]Oh why do I compare myself to everyone
[00:47.95]And I always got my finger on the self-destruct
[00:51.34]I wonder when I love me is enough
[00:53.44]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:54.42]I wonder when I love me is enough
[00:56.68]Yeah yeah yeah
[00:57.85]Why am I always looking for a ride or die
[01:00.95]'Cause mine's the only heart I'm gonna have for life
[01:04.12]After all the times I went and f**ked it up
[01:06.30]All the times I went and f**ked it up

[01:29.18]I'm way too good at listening

[02:00.67]Yeah yeah yeah

[02:13.58]Is enough

[ti:I Love Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Demi Lovato]
[al:I Love Me (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.18]//
[00:04.37]//
[00:06.56]翻阅各种杂志
[00:09.82]告诉我该变成谁
[00:13.07]太擅长伪装
[00:15.54]看不到真实的自己 只看得到虚假的自己
[00:18.70]不管吃什么 我都觉得罪恶
[00:22.67]感觉自己是个罪人
[00:25.84]绝地武士级别的伤害
[00:28.34]脑海里的声音如影随形
[00:31.68]我对待自己心狠手辣
[00:34.81]却对别人关爱有加
[00:38.35]我独自一人
[00:39.99]自我矛盾
[00:42.34]我只有自己
[00:44.25]为何我要拿自己与别人比较
[00:47.95]我总是做着毁灭自我的事
[00:51.34]我不知道何时才能好好爱自己
[00:53.44]//
[00:54.42]我不知道何时才能好好爱自己
[00:56.68]//
[00:57.85]为何我总是在寻找一个生死相依的人
[01:00.95]只有我自己能与自己相伴一生
[01:04.12]无论我经历多少磨难 犯下多少错
